system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Customer reports intermittent slow loading times on the dashboard page.

conversation_history.message: The dashboard page sometimes takes over 10 seconds to load. This has been happening for the last few days.
Thanks for letting us know, Sarah. Could you confirm if this happens at specific times of day or under certain conditions?
It seems to happen more during the afternoon hours, but not always. I haven’t noticed any particular pattern.
Got it. We’ll investigate potential load issues during those times. Are other parts of the platform working fine?
Yes, everything else seems fine. It’s just the dashboard loading slowly.
Thanks for confirming. I’ve escalated this to our engineering team to investigate further. We’ll keep you updated.
